scripts.server:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev npm run dev --prefix server
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npm run prod --prefix server
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev concurrently "npm start --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.start:finit:server: cross-env NODE_ENV=prod npm install & npm install --prefix server & npm run prod --prefix server
